name: Derby Car War
description:
Derby Car War is a wreck-fest car smash game where as a destruction driver you race the weaponized car to knockout, destroy, damage and demolish reckless cars by firing missiles and smashing hits.
Features
• Extreme car destruction battle in arena!
• Wipe out the enemies thrilling adventure!
• Crashes, hits, missiles, ramps, stunts & much more!
• Amazing cars available to unlock!
• Real Car physics and controls!
• High Quality graphics and best sound effects!
